name: Louis GOMEZ, Appellant, v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary Pennsylvania Department of Corrections and William Ward, Chairman, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees

parties: Louis GOMEZ, Appellant, v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary Pennsylvania Department of Corrections and William Ward, Chairman, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of September, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
856 A.2d 830
Louis GOMEZ, Appellant, v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary Pennsylvania Department of Corrections and William Ward, Chairman, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 3, 2004.
